history.proof: intros. apply Rplus_lt_reg_l with (x:=x). rewrite Rplus_comm. apply Rplus_lt_reg_l with (x:=x). rewrite Rplus_comm in H. hauto use: Rplus_comm, Rplus_le_lt_compat unfold: Rle.

exceptions.exn: In environment x, y, z : R H : x + y < z + x Unable to unify "x + y < z + x" with "x + (y + x) < x + (x + z)".

original: intros. apply Rplus_lt_reg_l with (x:=x). rewrite Rplus_comm. apply Rplus_lt_reg_l with (x:=x). simpl in H. rewrite Rplus_comm in H. apply H.
